2 "Fireball" artifacts.
Expensive, of course. But okay, here.
D-damn, what prices. I better look for it myself.
Hello to the gang.
And don't you cough either, fraer.
Here, hold this! The bag is heavy, damn it. Got wet, or what? Can't figure it out.
We'll dry it, don't fear! You work efficiently, mine should learn from you. But okay. Here, I saved something here. Take it, we'll be even.
What do you want?
I see you are a tough guy. Want to earn money?
Do you want to offer me a job?
Well, there is one place here, you can raise good money. True, the risk is substantial too.
What place, what job? Don't be shady.
Alright, there is one man, Varyag. Can be found in the Agroprom basements. So, he offers to play a game. Pays well. But there is one but...
What "but"?
Problem is that no one has won yet. Not once. And losing equals death.
Fun. Alright, I'll think about it. Maybe I'll risk it.
Varyag?
Yes, that's me. Decided to test yourself?
Well, sort of yes.

Know the conditions? No? I'm telling: you need to pass four circles in a row. Each time there will be more monsters, and they will be more insidious. If you pass all four circles in a row, you will receive a reward: Transmutation recipe "Grandmother Burer's Beads" and a weapon - FN FAL rifle. Remember! You cannot leave the Agroprom basements while participating in the run. And also you will have to hand over your weapons. Only a knife. You cannot take anything else with you. You will need to run to that end of the dungeon, almost to the end. In that place a medkit and a bandage will be waiting for you. Hope you figure it out. When you run there, I'll give a signal to return.
Everything is clear to me.
Well, ready?
Yes, sort of.

Hand over your things. Reminding, as you run to the end, a medkit and a bandage will be waiting for you there. If you return, if you return, of course, I'll give a medkit and a bandage too. And so every circle. So your things won't be needed for now.
Here.
Yeah, seemed okay. True, these zombies, bitches, are tenacious...
Catch your breath. Here, take a medkit.
Thanks.
Well, the first circle is passed.
Yeah, I see.
Alright, let's go for the second.
You can wish me luck.
Woah, that was harder now.
Issuing a medkit now.
Thanks.
Well, ready?
Yeah, sort of caught my breath... Well, I'm going for the third...
Bloodsuckers! Beasts! Almost tore me to pieces.
Yeah, better not mess with them... Especially without a weapon.
Well okay. Last circle left.
Yes, you are right. Here, take a medkit.
That's it, I'm going.
I did it!
Yeah, didn't expect it! Good job!
Alright, give the things back. Need to eat something.
Here are your things. And here is your prize. And also giving you one transmutation recipe. Will come in handy.
Thanks, and especially for the recipe. I'll go teach those burers a lesson in politeness.
Damn, Varyag, I couldn't do it.
Here are your things and get out of here, cheater.
What did you want, Brother?

Listen, brother. We snatched two unique guns from mercenaries here. We don't need them, it's hard to find ammo for them anyway. But Duty will probably be interested in them. Take these guns to them, and in return take a crate of ammo from them, but only for the Kalash.
Well, it's not really on my way...
Come on, brother, help me out. I won't remain in debt either. I'll throw in some junk.
Okay, convinced. Give them here.
Greetings, Colonel.
Oh, Strelok? What brings you here?
Well, I brought you something.
O-oh, where did you get this?
Bes passed this. He and the guys captured them from mercenaries, asks for ammo for the Kalash.
Interesting rifles, and they don't seem to ask for much. Alright, I won't keep you. Here, take the ammo. Greetings to Bes. A good man, pity he is not with us.
Hello, Bes. Greetings to you from Petrenko. Calls you to join them.
No, Strelok, I won't go to them. They have their own business, I have mine. And I don't like their drill.
Alright brother. Here is the ammo, take it. As promised.
Thank you. And I saved something for you too.
Hello, Professor.
Greetings, young man. Do you have business with me?
Yes. Here, stopped by to buy something. And maybe there is some work for me?
M-m-m... Actually there is. But can you handle it?
Let's try, Professor. I am capable.

Well then, here is your task: we discovered several specimens of monsters that possess abilities unexpected for their species, namely very fast regeneration. We are very interested in why and when this mutation occurred. And it is necessary to simply observe them. To do this, you need to hang, so to speak, a marker.
Where to look for them and how to hang a marker on them? They are unlikely to be happy to communicate with me.

A pseudogiant was last seen at Rostock. There is a downed helicopter lying there for a long time. A "bald" chimera can be met in the Dark Valley. You know, there is an abandoned factory, bandits sometimes set up their lair there. So, behind it there is a small swamp, right by the fence, where the drain pipes are. Well, hope you understood. And a bloodsucker lives at the Cordon. You know, there is a destroyed bridge and two abandoned pig farms nearby. That's somewhere there. Now about the method of hanging a marker: I will give you a carbine, converted by one of our craftsmen. So, it shoots only special ammo, which upon contact with the victim's body hangs a marker on it, without causing harm. Thus, you will be able to hang a marker on all three. Yes, don't forget to return the carbine later, you don't need it anyway, you can't kill with it, and we still need it. If everything goes successfully, in return I will send useful information to your PDA - the transition from Yantar to Radar and back. And, of course, you cannot kill the test subjects, I need them alive.
Professor, I returned.
You handled the task well, Strelok. Didn't expect it, to be honest.
I told you, Doc, that I am capable. Although had to run around.
Well then, give me the carbine and your PDA. I will record the data about the Yantar-Radar transition on it.
Doc, well? Work some more?

Well then, there is one very delicate matter. One of our scientists, Associate Professor Dorodin, betrayed us. He stole one very rare artifact and passed it through a corrupt major to a customer on the Big Land, receiving very big money for it, which was transferred to his bank account. Then he agreed with three military men to help him get out of the Zone. Another scientist, his assistant, fled with him. And this second one possesses very valuable data, for which they are ready to pay a considerable sum on the Big Land too. His memory is phenomenal, keeps all information in his head. But without Dorodin he is nobody and his name is nothing. No one will even talk to him there.
So. And what is required of me?
For such betrayal punishment must be severe! Eliminate Dorodin and that's it. Do as you see fit with the second one. He will no longer be dangerous for us later. Although he should be punished too.
I'm afraid I'm not on the same path with the military. Unlikely they will be happy to see me.
Let's do this: I give you the task to eliminate Associate Professor Dorodin, and all the details are with Dan. He seems to have planned everything already. After all, he is our head of security.
Hi, Dan. The Professor said that you are aware and will explain everything to me.

Hi, Strelok! I see Sakharov briefly told you about the betrayal of Dorodin and his assistant. We tracked their movement. These two are still in the Zone. Now they are in the Dark Valley under the protection of three corrupt soldiers and are waiting for a helicopter, which is supposed to ferry them out of the Zone. You need to find them and eliminate them. Dorodin must be destroyed. He is your main target. The second traitor should also be shot for order's sake, but that's how it goes.
Everything is clear. Let's get to business, what and how?

Do you know the X-18 laboratory in the Dark Valley? Just a bit to the right there is such a hilly field, many anomalies and mutants. There is also a small fence along the edge... Alright, I'll hang a marker in your PDA. So, the three soldiers guarding the traitors are clearly special forces. You, of course, don't need to meet them. I'll mark a spot on the map for you. Climb onto the roof of the X-18 complex, it's an excellent firing point. And remember, your main task is the elimination of Dorodin. He must be taken down quietly. And most importantly, do not catch the soldiers' eyes before that, otherwise you will fail the whole thing. Yes, and one more thing: both scientists are dressed in identical green scientific suits. So you won't have time to figure out "who is who". Therefore, take down both in turn, the bullet will sort it out itself. As you get to the roof, act quietly and quickly. And as you take down Dorodin, then you can lay down the soldiers quite calmly. I will be in touch. Read messages from me...
Dan. Do you have a sniper rifle?
I can supply a powerful sniper rifle and thirty sniper rounds for it.
How much?
Not much. Four "Fireball" artifacts.
Here, take it.
Don't have it.
Professor, good afternoon.
Come in, Strelok. You handled the task well, I am pleased with our cooperation.
Nice to hear. Hope this will reflect somehow on my well-being?

You know, I thought here that you will still have time to earn weapons and ammo. Instead, I will give you valuable information and a couple of artifact transmutation recipes. Give me your PDA, I will send information about the transition from Agroprom to Yantar and back to it. Yes, and one more thing: Your help is required again. One of our employees disappeared here. Kruglov has all the information. Talk to him, please.
Alright, I'll go talk to Kruglov.
Professor, do you have anything for sale? %c[orange][Barter]
There are ammo, medkits, weapons.
What ammo?
What weapons?
What medkits?

From ammo here is what I have:
 - "7.62x51 mm NATO" - 2 packs for three "Droplet" artifacts,
 - "7.62x51 mm NATO BP" - 2 packs for two "Fireball" artifacts,
 - "7.62x54 mm B-30" for PKM - 2 packs for "Film" artifact.

There are NATO sniper rifles:
 - FN FAL - for 1 "Soul" artifact,
 - HK G28 - for 1 "Crystal" artifact,
 - SV-98M - for 10 poltergeist eyes.
Scientific medkits - three pieces for ten cat tails, Antirads - two pieces for ten Burer Hands.
Give me 7.62x51 mm NATO I just have three "Droplets" with me.
Give me 7.62x51 mm NATO BP. Love to shoot with armor-piercing.
Give me 7.62x54 mm B-30 for PKM.
No, Professor, nothing needed today.
Give me Howa Type 20. I have ammo, but nothing to shoot from.
Give me the HK G28 Rifle. I'll test what kind of beast it is.
SV-98M - my dream, taking it without looking.
Need scientific medkits, taking.
Give me antirads, I guess, my back is itching, isn't it from radiation?
I met "Captain". It is not my brother, a mistake occurred...
Sorry, I sympathize with you.
General, Captain Sobolev told me that you can show the path to the Cordon from the Dark Valley.

Well, that will be known in some time. I sent a scout to the factory where bandits are entrenched. So he must obtain information about where bandits keep information about transitions from the Dark Valley. Meanwhile, you help us a little too.
Alright, General, I'll wait. How can I help you?
I see you handle weapons well. So, I think there is work for you.
What needs to be done?

Lately, painfully a lot of different filth has bred near the X-18 laboratory. It would be necessary to clear the entire territory adjacent to X-18. Scientists asked us a long time ago, but somehow we never got around to it.
Understood, General, executing already.
General, permission to report?
Hello to you, Strelok. Still joking? Alright, what about the task?
Task completed, territory cleared. Path to the laboratory is free.
Well done! And here is the deserved reward.
Well, what about the transition to the Cordon, General?

Listen, Strelok. According to our data, somewhere on the territory of the abandoned factory in the Dark Valley there is a bandit stash. If we find it and, so to speak, expropriate it, then by this we will inflict quite serious damage to local bandit gangs. In this stash, besides weapons, there seems to be a flash drive or disk with information about the transition to the Cordon.
General. The factory is big. Searching for a stash there without exact coordinates is like looking for a needle in a haystack.
I understand. But if everything were simple, we would have found it long ago ourselves. The only thing I will say, there is one person, a bandit, called "Jila". Find him, he can help find the stash.
Strange. A bandit will help me rob his own?

He has some beef with bandits. Crossed the path of one of the leaders, apparently. So, I think if you talk to him normally, he will crack. It was he, by the way, who leaked useful information to my scout.
And where to look for this Jila?
Look somewhere near the factory, can't say more precisely. He is hiding from everyone.
Greetings! Are you, by chance, Jila?
Well, it's me. And what is it to you?
Well, if you are Jila, then I am at the right address.
Don't stall. What do you need, fraer?
You possess some information that I need. Namely: You must know where the bandit stash is.
Ah, so that's it. But why the hell do I need you?

For those who don't understand, the layout is like this: Any day now your own will whack you. Strangers don't need you at all. And here I am, your savior. You help me, and I will put in a word for you before Voronin. You'll be able to stay at the Duty base.

Alright, fraer. But let's change the layout a bit: You first agree with Voronin, and only then I tell you about the stash. You have all the trump cards, and I have only one. You understand yourself, if I tell you about the stash, then I won't be needed anymore.
Deals. Wait, I'll be back soon.
General!
What is it, Strelok?
I found that bandit. He agrees to tell about the stash. Only this... He wants you to take him under your protection and let him onto your base.
What next! Why do I need all sorts of bandit scum here? Things will start disappearing from the guys. I know these criminals, only the grave will fix them.

Voronin. He is a former paratrooper, not a thief. He just got unlucky. Well, went to prison, and there learned about the Zone. So he rushed here after serving time. And who else is he supposed to go to here? You don't take former convicts. So the guy had to join criminals. But otherwise he is a normal man, I vouch for him.
Well, if you vouch, then fine. Let him come. Just warn him: If I catch him stealing - straight to the wall.
Hello, Jila.
Greetings.

Well, that's it, I agreed with Voronin, you can move to their base. Only he also asked to warn that you'll go to the wall if you steal anything. That's it, I fulfilled my part of the deal. Now it's your turn.
Listen to me. The stash is in the pantry, in the main building of the former factory. I'll send you a marker, with it you will surely find it quickly.
Here, General, hold this. Everything I found.
Not bad, so much ammo! Could arm a small gang!
There was also that very flash drive you talked about.

Well done! That's it. Those bandits will be "happy" when they discover that their stash is empty. Ah yes, here, take this for the work. Deserved. So, let's see what's on the flash drive. One minute...
Well? What's there?
There is data about the transition. I am ready to send you the marker of the path from the Dark Valley to the Cordon and back to your PDA.
Well that's excellent. Now I can move out to the Cordon.
Want to say something?
I want to ask you about something. By the way, what is your name?
Call me Strelok. What do you want to ask?

I have a portable radio station here. Take it to Zahar. I want to have constant communication with him. Instructions are inside if needed. I think he'll figure it out. And tell him I hold no grudge against him and will definitely find him when possible.
A bit far, but okay. If there is time - I'll drop it off.
Zahar, hello.
Strelok, hello! Decided to visit us again? Found your brother?

No, haven't found my brother yet. But I found your friend, Captain Sobolev. He serves in Duty now. Asked to convey that he holds no offense against you. Here, he passes you a portable radio for constant communication with you. Instructions inside.
Huge thanks to you, Strelok! You brought good news. Here, take this. A little buckshot for you as gratitude from me.
No need for thanks, Zahar. Today I helped you, tomorrow you help me. That's how we live in this cursed Zone, damn it...
Can I be useful to you in anything else?
M-m. There is one little matter in which you can help me.
Speak, what needs to be done.

You see, after I walked you to the transition to the Warehouses last time, I was returning back and collected rare artifacts. And when passing near the bridge, I ran into a pack of pseudofleshes. They drove me under this bridge, barely fought off the beasts. But here is the bad luck, I dropped the container with collected artifacts somewhere. There was no time to search, fleshes wounded me slightly. Had to go to the camp faster. Thank God, managed to get there before dark. My leg still hurts.
I understand that you suggest I find your container with artifacts?
Yes, it would be very handy if you helped me. I won't remain in debt. And I will mark the place where to search approximately on the map.
Alright, Zahar. Mark the place for searches, and I'll try to help you.
Zahar. I found your container.
Thank you, Strelok!
Ran into beasts. They almost drove me from this world! But nothing, managed.
Yes, Strelok. Many monsters bred in the Forest nowadays. Can't keep up shooting them. Well, give me my container. And I prepared something for you for your work.
Here, keep your container. And don't lose it anymore!
Hi, Dan.
Haven't seen you for a while. And our zombies, you see, still keep coming and coming every day. How many of ours have already fallen. Listen, here is what I think...
What?

There are so many monsters and zombies on the factory territory at Yantar... Ugh... And all this filth howls, moans, yells and growls every night. I haven't been able to sleep for a whole week. Here is the thing: need to go there and clear the territory. Will you take it?
The job is not simple. Do you pay well?
I won't pay very much, honestly saying. But I have a handheld grenade launcher and charges for it. Here, take it. Have a blast there to the fullest.
Hi, Dan. Well, I was there. Had a blast to the fullest!
Yeah, everyone heard. Finally I will be able to sleep.
Will you take the grenade launcher back?
No, take it as a reward. And I'll throw in some more ammo for you.
What did you want?

Buddy, help me out. Tolik is sending an SOS signal, but I can't leave. Wolf placed me here. We've had problems with bandits lately. Well, you'll get to the camp, and Wolf will explain everything there. You, uh, don't go into the village, bandits are there. Wolf and the experienced ones went on a raid, and bandits came. Who was there to defend the camp? Rookies either scattered or, well, you understand... Anyway, I'm talking too much. Help Tolik.
Where should I look for him?
Wolf placed me here, and Tolik near the transition to the Garbage. So, look for him there. Hurry, brother, there are beasts here - God forbid they take him down!
Alright. I'll go see what happened there.
Are you Tolik?
I am. Oh, brother, I feel awful.
Well, nothing, you'll recover. Main thing is, you stayed alive.

Brother, help me out. Help me get to the camp, Wolf will thank you there. I'm afraid I won't make it alone, seeing double. A bloodsucker gored me pretty bad. Good thing a couple of boars appeared, it switched to them.
Alright, brother, let's go. Or you really won't make it.
Are you the boss?
Yes, I am. They call me Wolf. Thank you for not leaving Tolik in trouble.
Don't mention it. Helped and helped. We are own people - we'll settle up.

No, brother, not everyone will rush to help, and some will even help send you to the other world. For a good gun or a valuable artifact. I have something here, take it. Not much, though, don't hold it against me.
Petruha told me about bandits.

Eh, yeah... such things happened here: I went to Agroprom, well, Barman sent me. Took the guys who are more experienced with me. Fanat and a few rookies remained in the village. Well, bandits took advantage of this and came. Shot half of them, half ran away, and they took Fanat while he was sleepy. Told him to drink less. He gets wasted and sleeps for a day, you can't wake him up even with a cannon.
Didn't try to retake it?
How?! Look yourself. There are two or three times fewer of us. And go with whom, just youngsters.
Well, what if I help you?

Well, you are evidently a seasoned stalker! With you, of course, chances to kick bandits out of the village are higher, but we still need more experienced people. Listen, I called for a small group of experienced stalkers for backup, but they got delayed on the road somewhere. They say they are afraid of monsters. Thinking about turning back altogether. Right now they set up camp not far from here. If only we could help these guys get here faster, then we'd kick bandits out of the village in two counts.
I can go to them. But what about themselves? Especially since you say it's not far?
What, you haven't heard?
No. About what?
So many mutants bred there, oh boy! It is very dangerous there now. No, brother, I won't go there. Too risky business.
Well okay, I'll go. Speak, where?

Well, if you are not afraid, then listen... Or better let me drop a marker on your PDA. Find the stalker guys there, persuade them to join us. If they agree, lead them to me. When they arrive, then we can try to retake the village.
Understood everything. Moving out.
Greetings, stalkers. Are you going to Wolf?
Yes, us. Only we are afraid to go further... There were five of us, mutants tore two apart. We had to hide here.
Understood. I came to escort you to Wolf. Don't be afraid, we'll run there quickly with me. If anything, I'll cover. Deal?
Deal. Yes, honestly speaking, I'm tired of being afraid all the time myself. After all, we are not some cowards. Let's go, lead us.
O-oh, that's the spirit! Moving out, don't lag behind.
Well, Wolf? I brought the guys.

I see, well done. Now we can move out. Eh, if only Fanat wouldn't get killed. Well okay, you see yourself. My people are mostly inexperienced, so the main work falls on your shoulders. Just don't climb forward too much, stay close to me while we walk to the village, and then act according to the situation.
Understood, not the first time. Well, moving out?
Let's go. Walk next to me. We'll cover the rookies, if anything. Don't run far from me.
Well, Wolf, rejoice - the village is ours.
Yes, brother, thank You.
Listen, why didn't bandits touch the Barman?
Barman? You're kidding! That old fox will get out of any trouble. And who will touch him, with his connections? Bandits want to eat and drink too. Weapons again. A lot goes through him in the Zone.
Alright, Wolf, see ya. I just need to visit the Barman.
Wait. I'll drop a couple of transmutation recipes for you, they'll come in handy.
Hello, Knyaz! Is there work?
Oh, look who's here! There is a little business, Strelok. My kids gathered for a meeting with Chehov's gang.
And who are these Chehovskie?

Just some trash. Work mostly by lawlessness. For a "Stone Blood" they'll blow brains out just like that, damn... In general, for me, they are complete lawless ones. But they have power, so we have to reckon with them... Freaks.
So, what is the problem?

One problem - I don't trust them a damn bit. Agreed that the meeting will pass without weapons. We'll see... In any case Krest will be there, my old pal. I fear something might happen. Would need to cover Krest just in case.
Where should the talk take place?

At the Garbage, not far from the transition to the Dark Valley. You, don't catch their eye. Chehov's people are nervous. No wonder, made so many enemies. If you get spotted, they'll start blasting immediately. There is a ruined building, not far from the checkpoint at the Garbage. You climb to the top. The view from there is most excellent. Hide there and sit. Don't move. If everything is tip-top, we'll part peacefully. You holster the weapon and come to me. But if shooting starts, you don't leave these nits alive, damn, and mostly protect Krest. In short, until my signal don't think about shooting and don't catch their eye. Sit in place and wait. I know you: one thing - immediately grab the gun.
Hello, Knyaz.
Ah, Strelok arrived! Yes, you processed them skillfully!
Yeah, I almost fell asleep. Thought it was over, they'd part peacefully.
Okay, okay. Special respect for Krest. Here, take this. A small gift from the gang for you.
Hello, science.
And hello to you, Stalker. Want to earn money?
And what is needed?
We discovered one artifact here, unknown to us until now. Called "Controller's Heart". Need you to get one specimen.
And where am I supposed to look for this artifact? First time hearing about such thing.

There is one place, it is definitely there. At Agroprom, where the swamp is. It's somewhere there. But beware! This artifact has a strange property - it emits telepathic waves, which press hard on the brains. Also, it can be detected only by one detector.
What detector? Where to get it?

"Veles Detector", modified by me. Only with it you will be able to find the "Controller's Heart" artifact. Without it, you won't succeed in finding this artifact. Also will give info about transition from Yantar to Agroprom, you'll come out right near the swamp.
Alright, give the detector. I'll try to find this artifact.
Hello, science. What a task you gave me.
Was it hard?
There was a controller there. Had to tinker.

This artifact attracts controllers to itself. Why - is unknown yet, but there is something in it that pulls them to it. Well okay. Here is what I propose: Either you give back the detector now, and I pay you the reward for getting me the "Controller's Heart" artifact, or I leave it to you. And with it you will look for "Controller's Heart" artifacts and turn them in to me. And I will pay you for every brought "Controller's Heart" artifact. Without this detector you won't find them, that's for sure. Yes, I will pay with rare arts and not just one piece! Think about it...
Nah, brother. Better pay me for the work now, and keep the detector for yourself.
Alright, I'll keep the detector for myself. Will come in handy.
Hello Kruglov, I changed my mind.
About what?
Well, I want to take your detector from you. They say you pay well for every "Controller's Heart" art, and without it I can't find them.
I can give it, but not for nothing.
What do you want?
Grandmother Burer's Beads.
So expensive! But okay, here.
Don't have it, will bring later.
Wanted to ask: I have a simple anomaly detector here. Do you happen to have a better detector?
I do. Can exchange for arts.
What do you want?
One "Controller's Heart" artifact exchange for "Veles Detector".
Eh, the last one. Here, take it.
I'll go search.
Hello to science.
And hello to You, Strelok! What did you bring?
Well, brought "Controller's Heart" artifact.
Well done! Rare artifact. Here is your reward.
Listen. There is a talk.
About what?
Well, you trade information?
There is such a thing.
I have several map fragments, on which, if you assemble all parts together, the location of Semetsky's stash is displayed.
And?
Well, I ran through the whole zone, but can't find a few parts. Maybe you can help determine coordinates by what is available?
There is one person. But you understand...
What is required?
"Crystal Soul of Bengal" artifact.
Wow, so expensive! Alright, I'll search.
You search. And I'll strain the little man, let him ponder.
Hello, Informer. Not empty-handed I came to you!
What, brought it?
Here, take it. "Crystal Soul of Bengal" artifact.
Well done. Give it here.
Well, what about my business?
Had to tinker, of course. Data that you provided is scarce. But still...
What "still"? Don't obscure.
Oh, how you turned crimson! Don't fear, everything is normal. Give your PDA, I'll drop stash coordinates.
Yes, Informer.
There is information about Radar - Dark Valley transition. There and back.
What do you want?
Two "Chimera Tears" artifacts.
Just knew it! Cooked this morning, exactly two. Here.
Alright, went to cook.
Well, hello, Barman.
Hello Strelok. I've been waiting for you for a long time.
Wow! You know me?

Remember! I know a lot, if not everything. Well okay, let's get straight to business. I know, you are looking for a brother. Came to me. That is good. Right now, truthfully, can't help you with anything yet, but will help a bit later.
You really are the "Information Center". People don't talk for nothing...

Strelok, I don't need compliments. You need to find Mahomet, right? Exactly right, I know. Mahomet is an experienced loner digger and he has some beefs of his own with Sidorovich. That is a trader, holds a "point" on the perimeter territory, Deep Station. So you need to go to Sidorovich. He will suggest where to find Mahomet. And I in turn also have business with Sidorovich, but I can't contact him now, because after the last blowout the Zone expanded and captured a large part of the territory and something weird is happening with connection there. And I extremely need to send a message to Sidorovich, savvy? So we have a mutual interest emerging.
And what do you propose?
I'll ponder a bit, consult with someone, on how to get you to the territory. And you, while I'm deciding this question, help good people.
What "good people" and help them with what?
You know them: Fang, Ghost, Feldsher... Continue?
Yeah, all familiar people... What is needed from me?

You see, many don't believe in the extraterrestrial origin of the Zone. Gets an impression that it didn't do without human hands here. You probably know that there are several laboratories on the Zone territory?
I know. Even visited some.
Well so, what are they for? What experiments were conducted? Unclear... The military visited some of them and found some documents.
Continue.
Need to find these documents. Or something that can shed light on this whole situation.
Where will I find documents? More than sure, the military already took all documents out of the zone.

Here you are right, of course. But you understand yourself, to get to the laboratory, one must know the Zone. Know it well. Someone surely guided the soldiers there. Understand what I mean? They had a guide. It's either a stalker, or a military from former stalkers.
How will we find him?

And here I will help you. I know who was the guide. Stalker by the nickname "Varyag". I can even approximately say where to look for him. At Agroprom. Can't say more precisely, but somewhere there. Find him and try to make him talk. He is a serious man, so be more careful with him. Go, and I'll ponder meanwhile how to cook up a "pass" to Peacekeepers for you and generally how to get you there through the soldiers' checkpoint. Find Varyag, find out what and how and immediately to me. By that time we'll come up with something worthwhile.
I love business people. Alright, everything is clear, I'm going to Varyag.
Are you Varyag?
Well, I am. And what is it to you?
I have a couple of questions for you. Barman sent me.
I have no desire to talk to you. Especially answering your questions. And I saw your Barman in a coffin. That's it, beat it, you are bothering.
Varyag, hello!
Oh, hello, Strelok! What brings you here?
Listen, Varyag, business for you. Barman directed me to you. Remember, you led the military to the laboratory? They were looking for some documents there.
And why do you or Barman need this?
Believe me Varyag, necessary. Very necessary to know.

Anyone else I would have shot, but you are the first who managed to win against me... Alright, listen: It was about a year ago. I was digging with might and main then, walked and researched the Zone far and wide. Especially various dungeons and laboratories interested me. Kept thinking, here I'll find such a place where there will be many-many artifacts, I'll hit, so to speak, the jackpot and leave the Zone forever.
Next.

Well and so once from another raid returning to the cordon, well and as always straight to the Barman. Walking, mumbling something under my nose, a few decent arts in the backpack, mood is good. And here out of nowhere spetsnaz. Twisted me and took to the checkpoint. And there... major Yarofeev. Rare bitch! He starts rubbing it in, say, either I lead a group of military to one laboratory, or they shoot me right here, since officially there are no people on the Zone territory, and everything that moves is subject to automatic destruction. \n\nWell what to do? Agreed, damn it! In general I led the soldiers to the laboratory. Moreover out of ten people only half survived. Told them to listen to me in everything. But no, where there, I am just a piece of meat for them that knows the way. Burer in the X-18 laboratory embellished me too, see. In short, they carried out a whole box with documents and back we went with them to the Cordon. There I bolted from them, because I was more than sure, Yarofeev would have shot me. What the hell does he need a witness for?
Listen, and those documents? Don't you know what was in them? Well, at least approximately?

Wow you give! Had nothing else to do but read a pile of various documents. I wanted to survive, and then for me it was the main thing. I think you need to somehow find this bitch Yarofeev. He definitely knows something.
Where to find him?

Where-where... At the Checkpoint, where else? Although he is sly, but a drunkard indeed. Because of this he will stay at the Checkpoint forever like that. As he gets wasted, starts yelling, and then can snooze for a day or two - hell you'll wake him. In short, find out from Barman how to find Yarofeev.
Well, thank you, Varyag. I'll go to Barman at the Cordon. Think he will suggest how I can see Yarofeev.
Greetings, Barman. I was at Varyag's - serious man.
Well and what? Managed to learn anything on our question?

Yes, managed to find out something. There is one major at the checkpoint. Yarofeev is his surname. He is exactly who is needed. He should have key information on our case. Do you know if Yarofeev is at the checkpoint now?

I know this nit. He is there. In short, such a picture is emerging: have to fight a little with the soldiers, time has come. If it won't work out to talk to him unnoticed. You try to slip through, well and there according to situation. In short, Godspeed, Strelok. After you find out information from Yarofeev, straight to me. Tell what and how, and I'll give you a pass to Peacekeepers and a letter for Sidorovich then. Such is the plan.
Alright. I'll go fight again.
Well, Yarofeev. I have a talk for you.
Who are you, damn it?
You better here, drink some water, and then listen carefully. Whether you live or not will depend on your answer.
What do you need?
Remember Varyag? A year ago or something like that he led a group of military to laboratory X-18.
Wait... well yes, happened sort of... Happened! Remembered! And what do you need from me?
I need to know what was in those documents that were carried out from the laboratory.
How should I know? It's a top secret operation. Who will tell me anything?
Well, if you don't know, then I don't need you.

Stop... stop, I really don't know what documents, but I remember that one of their main ones, a colonel, seems, who was "in the know", blabbed. We drank a lot, I remember, so his tongue loosened a bit. Spoke about that in this laboratory research on prisoners was conducted. Something there with impact on brains. Don't know, I don't understand a damn thing in this. Remember, that colonel also said that one should go to X-16, there is some installation or something like that. There should be some important documents there. Only how to get there? Two groups already disappeared. Helicopter is practically impossible to land there. All pilots say, as soon as you start approaching the laboratory territory, the helm fights out of hands, helicopter starts steering by itself as if. Some devilry.
Is that all?
Swear, that's all. Don't know anything else.
How I want to whack you... Well okay, live. But if you twitch - don't blame me. I'll shoot.
Hello, Barman.
Well what about Yarofeev?

Learned from Yarofeev that in laboratory X-18 some research on convicts was conducted. And there is also laboratory X-16, where some installation is. So, he says that there should be some important documents or something else there. But only getting there isn't simple. Some devilry is happening there.

I heard about this laboratory. Truly a dangerous place. Alright, will need to ponder what to do next, consult with someone. And you go to Deep Station territory meanwhile, find Sidorovich there in the village in the north-east and pass him an encrypted letter from me. And at the same time ask him about Mahomet. Here, hold the letter and pass to Peacekeepers. Show to the sentry, they should let you through. Peacekeepers are not soldiers, they think first, then shoot. But still be careful with them. Say that you work as a guide for the military at the Cordon. Don't worry about the pass, real one. Well, almost real. No one will dig under.
Clear. Give the letter and pass, and I'm moving out.
Hello, Barman.
Well, how is the success?

Took your letter to Sidorovich. He, in turn, passes you an answer. Here, hold. Learned from him about Mahomet too. Well, where he can be found. For this I need to get to Yantar to scientists first. So, the hike was very useful. True, had to shoot and run there too, but I'm already used to this. Alright, what's next?
Wait. Checking what Sidor writes there... So-so, interesting proposal. Alright, will need to think...
Something important there?

Yes, quite important affairs are emerging. But can't reveal the secret to you yet. Need to think everything over thoroughly and agree with someone before making a final decision. Alright, that's for later. And now to urgent matters. Regarding laboratory X-16 Yarofeev spoke about: you will need to go to this laboratory at Yantar and find something: documents, computer, laptop, in short, any thing that will help us understand what was happening there. Especially since for you, as I understand, it is on the way with your search for brother. \n\nYou, if you find anything, carry to Fang, he will wait for you at Army Warehouses, at the Farm, near Freedom base. Getting into X-16 will be uneasy. They say that in the laboratory itself there is a certain installation that burns out brains of everything living. Need to ask around scientists at Yantar, perhaps, they will be able to help penetrate the laboratory. Talk to Sakharov. The road to Yantar lies through "Rostock". How to get there, ask Count, especially since he asked you to drop by on a very important matter. Think you know where to look for him. Especially since it's on the way. While you sort this question out, I'll ponder here about our business with Sidorovich. Your help will be needed later.
Understood everything. Moving out.
Greetings, Professor.
O-oh, Strelok! Come in, I am always glad to see you. How are your affairs? Found brother?
No. Not found yet, unfortunately. I have a slightly different matter for you. I need to pass into laboratory X-16.
They say that a certain psi-installation works there, which destroys the brain of any living human. Don't even know how to help you...
Doctor, look. I have a helmet, perhaps something can be done with it?

Let me have a look. So, done quite not badly. Your helmet should screen radiation coming from the installation. But, apparently, still protection from your helmet is insufficient. You know, I thought here: if your helmet is retuned a little, then, perhaps, you will be able to pass into the laboratory.
Professor, how is that?
But, alas, I cannot do this myself.
And who can?

There is one person. We worked together once, but then... then something terrible started happening to him: He started screaming at nights, then suddenly fell silent and could sit looking at one point for whole days. Then even worse: He started throwing himself at people. We... I had to part with him. Apparently, he was covered by a radiation wave from the laboratory. Hand didn't rise to kill him. Dan and the guys took him to Radar to Sviblov, but they say he escaped. So you need to find him. He once long ago dealt exactly with the influence of psi-installation radiation on human brain and kept a diary. In this diary there is a lot of valuable stuff. And if one could acquire this diary, then I could retune your helmet.
Understood. I'll go talk to Sviblov.
Sviblov, hi.
O-oh, Strelok! What brought you to us?
Sakharov sent me to you. I am looking for the crazy professor.
This lunatic escaped at night, gnawed through ropes with teeth and escaped. Look, even wounded Kolka. As he goes on a rampage, hell you'll stop him. For me, he should have been shot long ago.
And where should I look for him now?

Well, most likely in the laboratory. But does it make sense to look for him? He is violent. Need sleeping pills, otherwise he will simply throw himself at you. Got hold of a machine gun somewhere, the freak, and shoots at everything that moves.
Where will I get sleeping pills?
Well, go to Kruglov, he will give you sleeping pills. Ask for a pistol at the same time. He has such a special pistol, shoots tranquilizers.
Greetings, science. I have a request for you.
What request?
They say you have a pistol that shoots tranquilizers. I need it. Help out. Give it to me for a couple of days.
I can give, but not for free, You understand yourself.
What do you want?
Here I gathered some valuable materials on monsters for Duty. And there is no one to carry.
Painfully far to walk.
Carry it, and besides the pistol I will give you one transmutation recipe. Very rare. Yes, and another request: go through "Rostock". Some gang of thugs appeared there. Need to deal with them.
Alright, nowhere to go. I'll go, deal with the thugs.
Greetings, General.
Oh, Strelok, come in! What did you come with?
Well here. Kruglov passed a case to you here.

Finally! Or I already started to worry. Now we will at least approximately know what the situation with monsters is. Hope this will help us. Well okay. Stop by Petrenko, he was looking for you for some reason.
Hello, colonel. You have business with me?
Yes, there is one little business. According to rumors, freedomers modified RG-6 for NATO Round M-209.
And what is required of me?
Everything is very simple: Acquire one specimen for us.
Alright, colonel, I'll try.
Halt.
Serviceman, have business.
I am ordered not to let anyone through.
And if really needed?
I don't take bribes.
I mean, maybe vodka?
What the hell do I need your vodka for, we have heaps of our own.
Maybe some weapon or medkits?
I have everything... Here, maybe... puff something good, but where to get?
Seems I can help you. Well, agreed?
Alright, bring weed, we'll talk.
Greetings, Knyaz. Have business for you.
And don't you cough either! What do you want?
Need weed, you understand yourself, not parsley.
E-e-eh, bro, sorry, but don't have, sold what was, and new will be brought in a week.
Come on, Knyaz, really won't find even a little for me?
Well, there is a little, but you understand yourself...
What do you want?
Strelok, my pal has a birthday soon here, want to gift a decent gun. Abakan with integrated collimator. He wanted such for a long time. Woah, remembered! Called "Assault Abakan", for real!
Labs, I'll search a gun for you, just don't give the weed to anyone.
Hello Knyaz, here, hold, dug up "Assault Abakan" for you.
Respected! Pleased, for real, damn! The boy will be happy. Wanted such for a long time. Well, thank you!
Well, didn't sell the weed?
You offend, boss! Everything is right, here is your weed. Put it in packaging, so it won't get wet. And also. Here is a present from me. Take, Knyaz doesn't keep junk!
Greetings.
Hello, got the weed, hold.
Good job. In short, I am stepping away now and pretending I see nothing. Come on, you have three minutes for everything.
Hello, colonel.
Come in, what did you bring?
Well here, as promised, brought modified RG-6.
Worked well, respect, and here is your reward - record one transmutation recipe and also: here, personally from me.
Well, fulfilled your request.
Thank you, helped out.
Alright, Kruglov, I am in a hurry. Give what promised, and I'll go. Many things to do.
Here, hold the special colt and extra clip with tranquilizer. Is this for the crazy professor?
For him the darling.

Well, then here is advice for you: as you see him, shoot him immediately, otherwise they say, he is rabid. If you hesitate, he will start firing at you. With this pistol you won't harm him, but if you hit, you will be able to talk to him. He will calm down for a while. Think you'll have enough time to talk. And also: need to hit the madman only once, and if more, then he can get even more enraged, and then definitely calm him down with nothing. Such is the peculiarity. And don't forget to bring the pistol back.
Professor... Professor, wake up!
I am listening... I am listening, I hear them. Do you hear them?
Whom?
Voices, they... they are calling me.
No, I hear nothing.
Mumble-mumble.
Professor. I need your diary.
Listen... they sing... so beautifully...
Yes, yes, very beautifully. But listen to me at least a little.
Diary?
Yes, yes! Voices asked you to give me your diary.
Voices... painful... and... beautiful.
They ask you to give the diary. And then it will always be beautiful and won't be painful.
Won't be painful, don't want... head.. very-very painful...
Believe me, everything will be fine. Give me the diary. After all you have it?
Alright... alright (gives diary). Won't be painful... they call... I will be happy... mumble-mumble.
God forbid such thing with me.
Professor! Finally got to you!
Did you acquire the diary?
Yes. Here it is, hold.
So-o. Very good. Let's look... uh-huh... understood. Give your helmet... so... he-ere. That's it. Now I think, it will protect you from psi-radiation.
I hope so too. God forbid becoming same as your professor.
Well then, Strelok. Hope you will succeed. May God keep you. Well, or whoever you believe in.
Well here we met.
Thank you, mercenaries, bastards, pressed hard.
Come on. Today I help you, tomorrow you help me.
Did you bring documents from laboratory X-16?
There were no documents. Here is a laptop.
Let's look. Uh-huh... so... Know what turns out? They conducted experiments on people in laboratory X-18, and then used obtained results in X-16, tuned their psi-installation.
Well and what should we do?

We still don't know who stands behind all this. But we learned that there is a group of people that produced terrible experiments on humans. That there is a certain installation in X-16. By the way, I think, it is not the only one. Surely there is more. Here is the thing: Need to visit laboratory X-18.
Why? Soldiers were already there. Unlikely they left anything for us.
In laptop there are relatively fresh records. There are even month old ones. Understand what I mean? Means someone was there quite recently.
Alright, I'll go. Maybe, find something interesting.
Hi, Fang.
Well what, was in the laboratory?
Was. And strange as it is, they were waiting for me there.
Who?
Monolithians.

I somehow thought so, that they are involved here somehow. Strelok, situation is heating up! Such a feeling that Monolith planned something. Diggers transmitted that they saw a group of Monolithians at Radar. Your meeting with them in the laboratory... Something very serious is brewing here, plus these mercenaries... In short, Strelok, Ghost is waiting for you. We need, before it's too late, to figure all this out.
Back to Pripyat? No, I won't go.
But why?
I barely left from there. No, screw it, this Pripyat and CNPP taken together! As you wish, but I pass...
Damn... Didn't expect from you, Strelok. Well okay. Will you fulfill one more request? Not hard.
What is needed?

Here is unsafe. Carry to Barman this flash drive that you brought, and laptop from X-16. Let them lie at his place for the time being. This is all I ask, go. Yes and Barman has new information for you. And I meanwhile will occupy myself with your question. Then come by, we'll decide how to be.
Alright, Fang. I'll carry laptop and flash drive to Barman.
Hello Barman. Parcel for you here from Fang.
What parcel?
Flash drive and laptop from laboratories.
Eh, d-damn... well... Well okay, give here. And what, no other place was found?
Fang asked me. Unsafe to store at Warehouses. There was already an attempt on him anyway.
What wanted?
There is work not dusty, walk a foreigner a bit around Cordon.
Screw these tourists. Will step in something again. What are they thinking about generally, is here what, culture and recreation park?

Come on, work is not dusty, pay well. You don't walk far with him. Lead to the destroyed bridge, well maybe a bit further, and back. He first asked to Garbage, but I told him immediately that no one will go with him to Garbage, too dangerous, primarily for him. Yes he will be glad even to this.
Where is your tourist?
He waits for you in the village.
Well okay, I'll work as a guide a bit, hope he is not a complete cretin.
Hello, is it you looking for guide?
Yes I... I want watch monsters, how is it "bloodsucker", "chimera".
Bloodsucker, chimera... hmm... feel have to tinker. Well, let's go or what.
Yes, I ready.
Why stopped?
Hard. Now, let breathe. And where bloodsucker? Want see living bloodsucker.
Well you persistent, okay let's go over bridge, there, think, will see not only bloodsucker.
Well, saw everyone wanted?
Not quite, maybe to Garbage?
To Garbage go yourself. I won't lead you there. Too dangerous, primarily for you.
Pity, very pity, well okay, then to camp return.
Long time ago.
Well, Sidor, job done.
I counted on you, that won't fail.
Okay, give payment and I'll go.
Here, hold.
What else happened?
Doctor and his friends have problems.
What problems?
Monolith announced hunt on them, yes and mercenaries also don't give rest. In short, they need help.
Here we go again! I thought, engage, finally, in my own affairs.

Turns out not good. They helped you after all. Besides problem needs solving, can't run from it. Monolith planned something serious. Fear, lest the end comes to us all. In short, need to go to Pripyat, rescue Feldsher and Ghost.

Well okay, it's on my way. I also planned to move closer to CNPP. Found out something about my brother. Need to find someone... Damn! Only how will I get to Pripyat? Through Radar? So full of mercenaries there.
Talk to Doctor, he will help you. Yes, and also Fang asked you to stop by. Something important he has for you.
Alright, I went. Will stop by Fang on the way. See you!
Hello, Doctor.
Good that came, Strelok.
Your friends in danger. To help them, I must get to Pripyat. Especially since I myself need there too. I am going to CNPP. Seems, I found a lead that can clarify what happened to my brother.
Yes, serious matters twisting now. And path will show, give your PDA.
Understood everything, hope see you again.
Hello, Feldsher. Long time no see!
Yes... Can't cheat fate.
What do you want to say by this?
However you try to run from what is destined to you, you won't run away. You must fulfill your mission.
What mission? What about?

Strelok, you need to go to Control Bunker once again. Apparently, in such short term something very not good happened for all of us, and you need to find some opportunity to prevent threat. Concrete information about what exactly those insane scientists plan in Bunker, no. Therefore have to act according to situation.
Alright. But what are my chances?

Won't lie, chances little, but you are the only one who can cope with this task. Most likely, you will have to encounter in Bunker some new kind of psi-influence, judging by specifics of experiments scientists plan there. Therefore necessary at least somehow secure yourself from possible danger. There is one very strong preparation. Called "Adulin". This is powerful biochemical mean, protecting human psyche for long time from various psi-influences and psi-attacks. Protection of this preparation is much higher than psi-helmet can give.
So and where to take this preparation?

Here not far, in very center of Pripyat, somewhere on Lenin square is a stash, and in it backpack with injectors of "Adulin", which lie in special refrigerator container. This is Monolithians' stash. Solomon told me about it. Bring me this backpack, and I will make you injection that will protect your mind from possible psi-influence or any other interference in your psyche, in Bunker.
Alright. Going search backpack with "Adulin" in stash on square.
Here, Feldsher. Found backpack with "Adulin" on square.
So, good. Give it here.
Here, hold.
So... And what next?
I will make you injection of "Adulin" now.
Hope it's not painful.
No, Strelok, it's not painful. But after injection some time you will feel a bit sick. But it will pass quickly.
Eh... How want to take and send you all to such mother.

I understand you, but such is fate... Your fate. And also: while you were absent, we with Doctor prepared gift for you - disposable "Teleportator". It can be very useful to you when no other exit will be. Only remember: after activation teleportation will happen from that point where person holding "Teleportator" in hand is located, to Swamps to Doctor. Teleportation possible only once and for one person. And be careful: here, in Pripyat, mercenaries already arranged one roundup on me. But nothing, left them. Had to move from stadium here... Surely they hang around somewhere nearby now too. Watch out! Well here, seems said everything wanted. Now prepare arm for injection.
Here is arm, inject faster. And for teleportator thanks. Surely will come in handy. Well and farewell, just in case.
Do I have a choice?
No. We need you. Beside, you know too much.
And what do you intend to do with me?
Have anything for sale? %c[orange][Barter]
Have weapons, ammo and simple medkits.
What weapons?
What ammo?
How much medkits?

Propose following:
 - SMG PP-19 "Bizon" for 40 blind dog tails,
 - MP-153 for 30 pseudodog tails,
 - TOZ-66 for 25 bloodsucker tentacles.
There are simple ammo for Kalash - 3 packs for 6 chimera claws and there is buckshot - 3 packs for 6 boar hooves.
Medkits 2 pieces for 6 flesh eyes.
Give Bizon, I like it.
Yes, Barman, being greedy is good, but in moderation.
Where is MP-153? My favorite weapon, taking.
TOZ - is a thing, taking.
Ammo for Kalash? Give, I just have many claws with me.
Buckshot? Need, give.
At such prices! Shoot yourself.
Well, give medkits perhaps, going deep into zone, you never know.
What wanted?
I doing small business here.
What business?
Change monster parts, but not all.
Which exactly?

Tushkano head - 10 pieces for 3 packs NATO ammo,
 Zombie hand - 10 pieces for 3 packs NATO armor-piercing ammo,
 Pseudogiant paw - 5 pieces for 3 packs sniper ammo to SVD,
 Controller hand - 5 pieces for 5 army medkits, plus five antirads.
Alright, if have - will bring.
Hello, Mazay. Here, brought something. %c[orange][Barter]

What have? Note, accept by fixed rate:
 Tushkano head - 10 pieces for 3 packs NATO ammo,
 Zombie hand - 10 pieces for 3 packs NATO armor-piercing ammo,
 Pseudogiant paw - 5 pieces for 3 packs sniper ammo to SVD,
 Controller hand - 5 pieces for 5 army medkits plus 5 antirads.
I have 10 tushkano heads.
I have 10 zombie hands.
I have 5 pseudogiant paws.
I have 5 controller hands.
Sorry, I mistaken.
What for sale have? %c[orange][Barter]
Weapons, ammo and army medkits.
What weapons?
What ammo?
How much army medkits?

Have this:
 - SIG 552 for 1 "Cobblestone" artifact,
 - SIG 550 for 1 "Fire Tears" artifact,
 - Kalashnikov Machinegun for 1 "Symbion" artifact,
 - M4A1 for 1 "Ruby Spring" artifact,
 - Steyr AUG A1 for 1 "Gold Chunk" artifact,
 - Desert Tech MDR for 1 "Soul Drops" artifact.
Give SIG 552
Give SIG 550
Give Machinegun
Give M4A1
Give Steyr AUG A1
Give MDR
Nah, at such prices, screw it, I better walk with Kalash.

Have this:
 - 3 packs "5.56x45mm AP" for 2 "Droplet" artifacts,
 - 3 packs "5.56x45mm SS109" for 2 "Stone Blood" artifacts,
 - 3 "F-1 Grenade" for 2 "Sparkler" artifacts.
Give armor-piercing.
Give simple ammo.
Give grenades.
Army medkits, 2 pieces - for 3 "Slime" artifacts
Give army medkits.
Hi, Lefty.
Don't cough either. Long time no see.
Business to you available. Have detector one unusual. Found it at one monolithian. Look. Maybe, possible to repair it?
Damn! Where will I get so many good artifacts? Well okay, going search.
Hi Lefty.
Hello, brother. Found arts?
Ran half zone. Here, hold.
Alright, wait a bit. Now little more... so... Here is all. Hold, like new. Now should recognize anomalies... almost all. Well, at least, most dangerous, that's for sure.
Hi. What wanted?
Oh, head splitting. Don't you have anything?
Well, have a little.
Wait, will bring now.
Well, let's, splash?
Let's. Well so what business do you have?
Went well. Let's another one?
Here, hold.
In short, have transmutation recipe. Very valuable.
What recipe?
Well, this... Let's another one?
Alright, let's... Well so what recipe?
"Stone Porcupine" transmutation recipe. Rare, I tell you, artifact! If I had one such... Eh...
What want for it?
You know, I have health problems lately. Liver to hell. Knowing people advised to hang on belt two specimens of one rare artifact. Called "Gold Chunk". But two such artifacts I don't have.
Alright, brother. If find, will bring. You only don't forget about recipe. And stop booze, won't end good!
Hi, I came for you.
What wanted?
What you, old man, forgot or what? About recipe I am.
Damn, memory became leaky! Well what, acquired arts?
Yeah. Here, hold.
Well, helped out, thank you! Will heal now. Well, and will drop transmutation recipe to you. Give your PDA.
Listen, bro.
What wanted?
Job is one, not dusty.
What job?
In short, one fraer is, called Noodle. So this bitch killed my pal. M-mother! If knew, where he... With these hands would little bastard...
What required from me?

In short, need find this nit and kill. And I for this will drop you one transmutation recipe, "Giant's Little Brother". Just in case say: one guy came here recently. Said, that saw this bespectacled bastard at Garbage not far from transition to Dark Valley. Try search him there. Only hurry, otherwise he might bolt somewhere.
Labs, try find your Noodle.
What have you done?
About what you?
And you, like, don't guess? Ordered you!
Who? For what?
And this better you know...

Ah, that one... You understand, we here with one man, I was little familiar with him, went for artifacts. Well, found little. On return way found stalker corpse. Well, you understand yourself, looted, this and that, found transmutation recipe one, artifacts several. Good, I tell you, artifacts. \n\nWas getting dark. We arranged lodging. He, my partner, stayed on guard, and I lay near fire. Woke up from that someone chokes me. That bitch! Spared bullets, or maybe didn't want noise, understand yourself, monsters-shmonsters. And I have knife in bootleg, big such, hunting. Well, I somehow reached it and, in short, stabbed man to death. And here his pals, apparently, try avenge me for this.
Lying, probably?
Believe, so it was! Listen, he, this Hmyr, what promised you for me?
"Giant's Little Brother" transmutation recipe.

That b-bitch! How he knew about it? Well okay... Let's so. I give you "Giant's Little Brother" transmutation recipe and on top, so to speak, thing one. Rare gun: revolver "Taurus Raging Bull". Thing very rare and valuable. Very powerful gun. True ammo to it hard find will be. So here, give you one more pack spare. Sorry, no more. And so, if gun likes, then ammo to it at Antiquarian can acquire. He trades various rare weapons. It's from him I bought revolver... For expensive! In Bar search Antiquarian, he visits there often. Ask around Borov, he suggests, where find him.
Screw you!
Alright, persuaded. Give recipe and revolver. And Antiquarian I will find anyway. Love rare "toys".
Well what? How there business our?
Yes all. Kicked bucket your Noodle.
Lad said - lad did. Respect.
How there about recipe?
Give your PDA, upload recipe. With you joke dangerous, pal!
Borov, is work?
Strelok, such matter. To me here man should have come with important information.
Well, and?
And what and! Not him, already second day, as should have appeared.
Well at least something known?

Yes really nothing. Only clue, that last message from him from Dark Valley came. Probably, Dutyers tied him or lawless-marauders, who often hang around there. Here what, go to Voronin, he seems there with his cop gang controls Valley. Maybe, manage clarify something. Only, certainly, don't need say, by whose request you came. Understand yourself, we have with Duty some ideological divergences.
Alright. Try carefully find out everything.
Greetings, general.
Hello Strelok. What brought you to us?
One person sent me. Says, that his courier disappeared. At you, in Dark Valley.

About courier know nothing. And not whole Valley we control. At factory generally hell what happens. Although... Here recently appeared gang of bastards, exactly on territory of abandoned factory. So, I sent guys mine there check. And neither hearing nor spirit from them. Go, look, maybe find out something.
Hello. Not you Borov searches?
Yeah, me. Thank you, brother.
What happened?
Yes devil pulled me shorten path little. Thought, from Radar through Dark Valley, and there to Bar not far. Aha, shortened... Here two days as here sit.
And why didn't they kill you?
And I told them, that Borov for me ransom give. Knew, that won't give, but time pull wanted.
Understood. Alright, let's to business. Information, that you carried Borov, where it?
Yes they cleaned me under zero! So that I don't have it.
That shit! Where will I search it?
Don't worry. I overheard little bandits talk. They wanted whack me anyway. They have stash somewhere in laboratory X-18. Not in laboratory itself, but in that its part, that on top.
Well okay, thanks on this too. Go search PDA.
Hello. See alive reached Bar.
Yeah, on way looked in my stash and took present for you. Thanks, that pulled me out from that mess!
Presents I love. Show what there you have.
This artifact "Chimera Tears". Not bad protects from various brain-breakers. Hold.
Well what, Borov. Seems all, swam away PDA. Exploded so, that whole stash to devil mother.

Now have again go to Pripyat to Ghost, it he me information obtained and passed through courier, and I already paid him advance. In short, have ask Ghost, so gave copy information, if, of course, he has copy...
Is one more but!
What but?
Road to Pripyat no... How get there?
Oh you devil... Here what, Strelok, is exit one.
Which?
Say, recently Freedomers either to Pripyat itself, or to Radar went... But, rumored, that they definitely found passage to Pripyat. And what if talk to Lukash?
Alright, try with him talk.
Greetings to you!
Hello, Strelok. Something long you not stopped by.
Yes all no time was. Listen, I on business.
What business you have?
Say, you found road to Pripyat?
Who told you?
Come on you. Not all same? I desperately to Pripyat need.
Well, is sort of path one. Information although not 100%, but, likely, accurate. Ours, when on Radar were, accidentally discovered.
Well so what? Help?
Listen, let's so: Service for service.
What want?

On Radar, in forest recently helicopter crashed. Well so, on it scientists something transported. This something in container metal. I sent guys there, but they found nothing. Find me this container, and I help you.
Understood. You need iron container, which must locate not far from crashed helicopter?
Yes. Forgot warn, container radioactive, so don't forget with self grab antirads more. And if exist arts, removing radiation, then you on belt them hang.
Hello.
Well what, found container?
Yeah, here it. Take faster, painfully radiates from it.
Here well done. And mine... only vodka guzzle, yes fables at fire tell. Idiots!
Alright, Lukash. What there with request mine?
Ah yes. Helped out you me great. Give PDA, mark road to Pripyat.
Hello. Here and met.
Hello, Strelok, come in. On business, suppose?
On business, how without it. You to Borov through courier information some passed?

Well, was, and what? You, probably, surprises, that I with bandits contacted? Borov although bastard rare, but pays well. And us then desperately money needed were. Here and got involved we with Fang in this scam. Obtained needed information and passed it through courier.
Understood. But here such matter: trouble happened. Courier that marauders... No, he alive, but PDA lost.
Here devil. That information in single copy was... although... although wait, remembered. Fang seems made copy. Only preserved whether it at him?
You assume, that at Fang must be copy?
Yes, likely, he man meticulous, loves reinsure. So that now you only Fang help.
Well so, remains one - go to Fang. Alright, bye. Maybe, still see.
